12.short_description: MRCOOL® E Star DIY 4th Gen 12k BTU Ductless Mini-Split Heat Pump Complete System 115V/60Hz
12.long_description: Introducing the latest in home comfort technology, with the 4th Generation MRCOOL® DIY 12K BTU, 22 SEER Ductless Heat Pump System. This powerful single-zone system has the capability of heating and cooling an area up to 500 sq. ft. It comes complete with a 12K condenser, 12K air handler, and a 25 ft. line set pre-charged with R-410A refrigerant. The line set also has quick connectors which require no special tools, equipment, or training to install. The MrCool DIY system also includes many features that make it stand out among its competitors.The first of which is its ability to achieve an outstanding 22 SEER efficiency rating allowing it to be Energy Star certified. This system has many operating modes to select from to suit the needs of the user, including HEAT, COOL, DRY (dehumidification), and SLEEP. It also has the Follow Me function that adjusts the temperature of the room based on the temperature being read by the hand-held remote control. The DIY features the convenience of being able to operate its modes and functions with your smartphone by using the Smart HVAC app. The MrCool mini split is the only system on the market to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty.
12.feature_list:
• Up to 22.5 SEER2
  • Gold Fin® condenser: corrosion-resistant coastal living - don't worry, our condenser is built to resist long term corrosion
  • Variable-speed DC inverter compressor technology cuts operating costs
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant
  • Standard 7-year compressor/5-year parts warranty; register for limited lifetime compressor warranty

13.short_description: MRCOOL® E Star DIY 4th Gen 18k BTU Ductless Mini-Split Heat Pump Complete System 208-230V/60Hz
13.long_description: The MRCOOL® 4th Generation DIY 18K BTU, 22 SEER Ductless Heat Pump system offers a complete solution to your home’s heating and cooling needs. This system can heat & cool an area up to 750 sq. ft and is capable of an Energy Star certified, 22 SEER efficiency rating. However, the best feature of this system is the ease of installation it provides to the homeowner. With the included pre-charged 25 ft. line set, some hand tools, and a few hours of time this entire system can be completely installed. This system comes equipped with many functions that separate it from the rest. It has multiple operating modes, which include AUTO, HEAT, COOL, FAN-ONLY, DRY (dehumidification) and SLEEP. It also features the Follow Me function, which allows the system to continually adjust the room temperature based on where the hand-held remote controller is. Need to operate the system when you’re not at home? No problem. The MrCool system also has the capability of being operated with your smartphone with the use of the Smart HVAC app. MrCool stands behind the quality and workmanship of this system by being the only manufacturer to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty.

14.short_description: MRCOOL® E Star DIY 4th Gen 24k BTU Ductless Mini-Split Heat Pump Complete System 208-230V/60Hz
14.long_description: The MRCOOL® 4th Generation DIY 24K BTU, 20.5 SEER Ductless Heat Pump is an all in one system that seamlessly combines efficiency, durability, and simplicity. This system can offer a 20.5 SEER efficiency rating that has allowed it to achieve an Energy Star certification and can heat & cool an area up to 1,000 sq. ft. It also features durable construction and a corrosion-resistant Gold Fin condenser. All of this is contained within a Do-It-Yourself system that can be installed by a homeowner in a few hours using simple tools. This simplicity is achieved with the use of the patented MrCool Pre-Charged Quick-Connect Line Set included with the system. Not only is this system capable of delivering exceptional performance, it is also equipped with up to six operating modes, which include AUTO, HEAT, COOL, FAN-ONLY, DRY (dehumidification), and SLEEP. The system’s Follow Me Feature allows the system to adjust the room temperature based on wherever you’re standing with the hand-held remote control. This system also has the ability to be controlled with a smartphone by way of the Smart HVAC app. Backed by a limited lifetime compressor warranty, this system is sure to meet your comfort needs and peace of mind.

15.short_description: MRCOOL® DIY 4th Gen 36k BTU Ductless Mini-Split Heat Pump Complete System - 208-230V/60Hz
15.long_description: The MRCOOL® 4th Generation DIY 36K BTU, 18 SEER Ductless Heat Pump is one of the most powerful single-zone systems offered in the DIY Series. This complete system has the heating and cooling performance to cover an area up to 1500 sq. ft while still being able to achieve an 18 SEER efficiency rating. All of this performance is within a system that can be easily installed by a homeowner with a few hand tools thanks to the patented MrCool Pre-Charged Quick-Connect Line Set that makes connecting refrigerant piping as simple as turning a few wrenches. The benefits of this system are not limited to the performance and ease of installation. This system also has many operational functions and features that sets it apart. The user can select from up to six operation modes AUTO, HEAT, COOL, FAN-ONLY, DRY (dehumidification), and SLEEP. This system features a Follow Me function which can constantly adjust the temperature of the room by sensing the temperature from the location of the handheld remote controller. This system can also be operated with an Apple or Android smartphone by downloading the Smart HVAC app. MrCool offers a limited lifetime compressor warranty on this system.

20.short_description: DIY 27,000 BTU 2 1/2 Ton 3-Zone Ductless Mini-Split Air Conditioner and Heat Pump Condenser - 230V/60Hz
20.long_description: If you’re in need of whole-home comfort but you don’t have ductwork, or you want the best and most efficient solution to discomfort without the stress and cost of a professional installation, then this DIY 27k BTU 2 ½ Ton 3-Zone Ductless Mini-Split Air Conditioner and Heat Pump Condenser is the perfect choice for you. This sturdy unit allows you to connect up to three DIY air handlers to it using pre-charged DIY line sets in order to cover as much space as possible in your home with clean, efficient, and comforting air. The best part about all of this is that you can install it yourself! This condenser possesses an impressive temperature range, as it can provide you comfort from -13° to 122°F. It’s also extremely well-built with a Gold Fin® condenser coating that will protect it from rust and water damage. You’ll also be able to enjoy the peace of mind from a 5 year parts warranty and a 7 year compressor warranty when you register your unit online. You’ll feel economic, comfortable, and handy once this DIY 27k BTU 2 ½ Ton 3-Zone Ductless Mini-Split Heat Pump Condenser is working to bring you total climate contentment.
20.feature_list:
• Easy DIY Installation
  • Gold Fin® condenser: corrosion resistant - live on the coast? Don't worry, our condenser is built to resist long term corrosion
  • Energy Efficient DC Inverter
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant

22.short_description: DIY 9,000 BTU 3/4 Ton Ductless Mini-Split Wall Mounted Air Handler - 230V/60Hz
22.long_description: Choose the DIY 9k BTU ¾ Ton Ductless Mini-Split Wall Mounted Air Handler for the most rewarding home improvement project that you can do essentially all by yourself. This unit can cover under 500 square feet, making it perfect for cooling a room in your home to your exact specifications or for additional heating and cooling power in a multi-zone setup. It’s easy to install, too! Just choose the best location to mount it, then connect it to the condenser using the DIY’s pre-charged line sets. You’ll save money before the system is even up and running! After you get this unit installed, there’s a lot of rest and relaxation headed your way thanks to modes like AUTO, DRYING, SLEEP, and many others. This air handler comes with a Smart HVAC Controller, which allows you to link the air handler to your phone so you can enjoy better control and a wider variety of features. You can rest easy knowing that this unit is covered by a 5 year parts warranty when you register your product online. This DIY 9k BTU ¾ Ton Ductless Mini-Split Wall-Mounted Air Handler will treat you to flawless indoor comfort for years to come.

Up to 5 zones, the Olympus offers aesthetically pleasing wall mounted, and ceiling cassette units. If you don't like saving money this system is not for you, otherwise please enjoy keeping more money in your pocket every month with efficiency ratings up to 23 SEER and 10.3 HSPF. This 3/4 ton 9,000 BTU wall mounted air handler can be matched with any Olympus condenser to condition rooms that are approximately 350 sq ft.

57.short_description: 1.5 Ton up to 16 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
57.long_description: Do you need cooling relief right away? How about a decreasing utility bill? Thanks to MRCOOL, you can have all these things and more with our Split System A/C Condensers. This is a brand new 1.5 ton, 208-230 volt, R410-A refrigerant, MRCOOL outdoor condenser. This condenser (when paired with other MRCOOL products) has a seasonal energy efficiency rating of up to 16 SEER, providing maximum comfort cooling. Thanks to its high energy efficiency, you will see your utility bill decline year after year. This unit only provides "cooling" (this is NOT a heat pump).

  • Corner-mounted controls for easy service
  • Full metal louvered construction to protect the coil/ hail protection
  • Factory installed high pressure switch
  • Thread-on pressure switches for simple, quick replacement
  • 10 year limited warranty on compressor
  • Charged for 15 feet of line set
  • Fan orifice for smoother airflow and sound level reduction
  • Lanced fins for maximum heat transfer
  • Every coil factory tested for leak proof construction
  • All units ETL and ETLC approved and AHRI Certified
  • Internally protected against high temperature motor overload conditions

84.short_description: 2 Ton BTU R-410A Upflow Cased Evaporator Coil
84.long_description: This is a brand new 2 ton, R-410A refrigerant, Upflow cased Evaporator Coil. This efficient and durable coil is the solution for heat pumps and air conditioners for fast, flexible application. This Signature Series coil, when appropriately paired with a MRCOOL Signature Series condenser and gas furnace or modular blower, can achieve efficiency ratings of up to 16 SEER.
84.feature_list:
• Interlocking door assemblies and snug line sealgrommets to minimize air leakage
  • All units UL Listed and AHRI Certified
  • One of the lowest water retention drain pans in the industry to minimize mold and mildew growth
  • External cabinet mounted distributor body designed for easy changing of orifice sizes and fast TXV connections
  • Foil-face insulation for easy cleaning
  • All drain pans are compatible with UV lights
  • Two dual drain on front of coil for install flexibility of drain lines around furnace vent and utility connections.
  • Superior service access to components, withtubing located at door split and foil-face insulation
  • 10-Year Parts Limited Warranty
  • Aluminum tubing, hairpins, distributors and header tubes. Copper refrigerant connections for easy brazing to both liquid and suction lines.
  • Tubing located at door split for easy coil service or cleaning
  • Tightly sealed, painted steel cabinet with wall to wall insulation to ensure <2% air leakage

112.short_description: 80% AFUE 3 Ton 45,000 BTU Upflow/Horizontal 5-Speed Gas Furnace
112.long_description: When harsh winter weather strikes, nothing compares to the warmth and safety a powerful reliable gas furnace can provide. While furnace heating technology has been around for decades, not all systems are created equally. Some are definitely better than others. One of the best on the market is the MRCOOL single stage, 80% AFUE gas furnace. This system can be installed upflow or horizontal, and is designed to operate for decades, provide powerful heating capability, and best of all, keep your heating bill affordable at the same time. It does the latter via its 80% AFUE energy efficiency rating. That mark of quality ensures 80% of every dollar you spend on heating fuel gets turned into real, effective heat for your home.
112.feature_list:
• Removable floor base for bottom return air
  • Easily removable slide out blower design
  • Left or right utility connections
  • Zero step horizontal conversion
  • Aluminized steel inshot burners for smooth ignition
  • Multi-speed high efficiency (constant torque) blower motor
  • AHRI Certified
  • Aluminized steel tapered crimped non-welded clam shell heat exchanger design
  • Heating efficiency of 80% AFUE
  • Registered 10-year parts warranty
  • Compact 33" height
  • Rotatable draft inducer for venting flexibility

122.short_description: 95% AFUE 3 Ton 45,000 BTU Multi-Position Multi-Speed Gas Furnace
122.long_description: There's nothing like your first high gas bill of the season to make you dread a long, cold winter. If that's the boat you're in, you need to make a change. You need to invest in a powerful, high quality, and energy efficient heater like the 95% AFUE multi-positional gas furnace by MRCOOL. Unlike a lot of other furnace models, the MRCOOL 95% AFUE furnace wastes a minimal amount of fuel. This ensures most of your dollar is spent wisely rather than wasted, and that in turn means you have to spend less of those dollars to keep your house warm all winter long. Depending on the severity of winter weather where you live, that might mean the difference between a few dozen dollars or a few hundred dollars. So don't dread winter. Instead, choose the efficient, versatile and high quality heat of the MRCOOL. It's also protected by a 20 year Heat Exchanger Warranty, and a 10-Year Registered Parts Warranty.
122.feature_list:
• Multi-speed high efficiency (constant torque) blower motor
  • Self diagnostics saves last 10 fault codes regardless of power interruption
  • Standardized widths for easy coil fit
  • 10 year registered parts warranty
  • 20 year heat exchanger warranty
  • Aluminized steel inshot burners for smooth ignition
  • Complies with California's South Coast Air Quality
  • Optional LP kit
  • Easily removable slide out blower design
  • Constant torque motor produces consistent airflow and even temperatures
  • Uses up to 1/3 less energy than a fixed-speed blower
  • Left or right utility connections, removable floorbase for bottom return air, zero step horizontal conversion
122.heat_exchanger_type: Aluminized steel primary, AL 29-4C Stainless steel

135.short_description: 2 Ton 24,000 BTU 14 SEER R-410A Multi-Postion Packaged Heat Pump
135.long_description: A MRCOOL packaged heat pump combines high performance cooling and powerful heating in one convenient, easy-to-install system. These units are competitively priced and operate at 14 SEER efficiency. A MRCOOL packaged heat pump will be a great solution for tough air comfort problems in a suburban home, commercial office space, condominium, seaside villa, or wherever you desire. MRCOOL packaged heat pumps combine superior product quality, energy efficiency, quiet operation, and financial value. The units come standard with a high performance compressor and eco-safe, chlorine-free R-410A refrigerant. This is truly an all-in-one packaged unit that will deliver energy efficient air comfort with minimal environmental impact.
135.feature_list:
• Warranty is 10 years on all parts if registered, 5 years if not (no licensed tech required)
  • 14 SEER efficiency
  • Designed for easy and convenient installation
  • Optional electric heat available
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant
  • Built in short cycle protection to protect the compressor
  • One piece "no leak" top design
  • Sloped drain for improved indoor air quality
  • Louvered panel coil protection
  • Insulation to minimize heat loss plus reduce sound
  • Built in "quiet shift" operation during defrost on select models
  • Efficient constant torque motor for wide airflow range
135.registered_warranty: Warranty is 10 years on all parts if registered
135.base_warranty: 5 years if not (no licensed tech required)

136.long_description: A MRCOOL packaged heat pump combines high performance cooling and powerful heating in one convenient, easy-to-install system. These units are competitively priced and operate at 14 SEER efficiency. A MRCOOL packaged heat pump will be a great solution for tough air comfort problems in a suburban home, commercial office space, condominium, seaside villa, or wherever you desire. MRCOOL packaged heat pumps combine superior product quality, energy efficiency, quiet operation, and financial value. The units come standard with a high performance compressor and eco-safe, chlorine-free R-410A refrigerant. This is truly an all-in-one packaged unit that will deliver energy efficient air comfort with minimal environmental impact.
136.feature_list:
• Warranty is 10 years on all parts if registered, 5 years if not (no licensed tech required)
  • 14 SEER efficiency
  • Designed for easy and convenient installation
  • Optional electric heat available
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant
  • Built in short cycle protection to protect the compressor
  • One piece "no leak" top design
  • Sloped drain for improved indoor air quality
  • Louvered panel coil protection
  • Insulation to minimize heat loss plus reduce sound
  • Built in "quiet shift" operation during defrost on select models

141.short_description: 2 Ton 14 SEER R-410A 60,000 BTU Heat Horizontal or Down Flow Package A/C and Gas
141.long_description: The MRCOOL Gas and Electric Packaged Unit combines a high performance 14 SEER air conditioner with a powerful gas furnace to deliver the best air comfort possible in all weather conditions. Like all MRCOOL products, this hybrid system is competitively priced, suitable for residential or commercial installation, and will run smoothly for years to come. A Package Gas Electric Unit is a fully self-contained, combination gas heating/electric cooling unit designed for outdoor installation. All unit sizes have return and discharge openings for both horizontal and down flow configurations, and are factory shipped with all down flow duct openings covered. Units may be installed either on a rooftop or on a cement slab. In gas heating mode, this unit is designed for a minimum continuous return-air temperature and a maximum continuous return-air temperature.
141.feature_list:
• Warranty is 15 year on heat exchanger and 10 years on parts when registered
  • Insulated low profile cabinet with rounded corners and one piece base is stable, safe and attractive
  • Features a high efficiency compressor designed to operate smoothly, quietly, and consistently
  • Architecturally compatible to fit a small footprint, convenient for installation and maintenance
  • All units ETL and ETLC approved and AHRI certified
  • Optional LP & High Altitude Kits available
  • Approved for installation in manufactured housing and mobile homes
  • Aluminized Tri-Dimple tubular heat exchanger for increased efficiency
  • Uses evironmentally friendly R-410A refrigerant
  • Efficient multi-speed motor for wide airflow range
  • Made in the USA
  • 81% AFUE

158.short_description: Cool Blade 14' Indoor Aluminum Ceiling Fan
158.long_description:
Introducing the Cool Blade HVLS 14 FT Fan. The patented Tubercle Blades design uses whale power technology to produce greater air volume than other industrial fans with similar diameter.
Our Tubercle Blades create a max angle reaching up to 21 to and reduce wingtip stall. By countering wingtip stall, the Tubercle Blades reduce the main source of noise and vibration. The advanced safety protection features ensure safe and stable construction and operation. The Cool Blade is inexpensive to operate and improves the performance of both new and old heating and cooling systems. On top of that the motor design reduces the need for regular maintenance saving you time and labor.
158.feature_list:
• Tubercle Airflow Technology. Our Patented Blades Blow More. Our patented Cool Blade Tubercle Airflow Technology, supresses outside heat & humidity through high volume air circulation, reducing temperatures by 10 degrees on average.
  • German Engineered Performace. UL & CE Certified NORD Motor. Our NORD DC motor is designed for silent efficient operation, working with our patented blades to generate a steady natural open-air breeze, surpassing conventional fans in climate control.
  • As Big as It Gets.As Big as You Need. Available in 3 sizes: 14Ft, 18Ft, & 24Ft. One 24 foot fan can cover over 24,750 square feet!
  • "Magic Box" Controller. Durable, Easy, Made in the USA. The USA-made Honeywell Controller is not only durable and easy to use, it is also a phase converter, allowing standard 220 volt installation for the powerful and efficient 3 phase motor.
  • Superior Safety. Protecting You and Your Investment. Cool BladeTM systems are engineered with electrical overload protection, reinforced fasteners, safety clips and connectors, steel wire safety cable and more.
  • Low Maintenance. Take it for granted. Cool BladeTM systems are engineered to reduce the need for regular maintenance. Inspection is recommended only every 20,000 hours of run time!
  • Efficient. Low Cost & Low Impact. The unit is inexpensive to operate and improves the performance of both new and old heating and cooling systems. Only 1.5kw power consumption.
  • Blade Pack: 10.63in X 14.96in 331 lbs
  • Motor Pack: 33.62in X 32.44in 353 lbs

161.short_description: MRBREEZE Black Circle Bladeless Fan and Air Purifier
161.long_description: Enhance your comfort and enjoy fresh air with the MRBREEZE Bladeless Fan and Air Purifier. The bladeless design makes the breeze feel natural and smooth. The motor, which rests in the base of the fan, can spin from 3,200 rpm at speed 1 to 8,000 rpm at speed 8. Even running at full speed, you'll barely be able to hear it. The efficient 360° HEPA filter can capture 99.9% of harmful particles and contaminants from your home's air, keeping the air you're breathing clean. Breathe easy and feel relaxed with the MRCOOL MRBREEZE™ Bladeless Fan.
161.feature_list:
• Safe Bladeless Design
  • Easy Cleaning & Maintenance
  • Remote Control Operation
  • Removes Odors
  • Reduces Allergens
  • Captures Pollutants
  • Powerful Airflow
  • 12 Hour Timer
  • Airflow Type=Natural Wind Simulation
  • Adjust the Vertical Wind Circle 360 Degrees
  • Oscillating Fan 120 Degree Base Rotation
  • Safe Bladeless Design
  • Power Cord Length: 59.1 in

171.long_description: MRCOOL Wi-Fi touchscreen programmable thermostat is a 7-Day programmable thermostat that provides universal system compatibility, precise comfort control and effortless programming. MRCOOL provides temperature control for gas, oil, electric and heat pumps for up to 3 heating and 2 cooling systems. Not only can you remotely monitor and control the heating and cooling system in your home or business ? you can stay connected to your comfort system wherever you go.

  • Menu-driven programming makes setup effortless.
  • Beautiful ergonomic design is smart and sophisticated to match your lifestyle.
  • Touchscreen capability.
  • Connect to the Internet to monitor and control your heating/cooling system
  • Compressor protection

328.short_description: ProDirect 1.5 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
328.long_description: You don’t want to endure another summer of sweating, so you better update your home comfort system as soon as possible with the MRCOOL ProDirect 1.5 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser. Packed with impressive and efficient parts like the rotary compressor and the piston flow control device, this condenser ensures that the temperature never climbs too high the entire summer. There’s no reason to worry about the durability of this condenser, either, because the galvanized steel cabinet and the Gold Fin® coil coating work together to completely guard your unit from damage and corrosion. The Gold Fin® coating, which keeps water completely off the coils, is totally non-toxic and environmentally friendly, and it offers another layer of insulation for boosted efficiency. This ETL listed and AHRI rated condenser has long term warranty support once you register it online. The MRCOOL ProDirect 1.5 ton split system A/C condenser will be the most impressive and efficient unit you’ll have for many summers to come.
328.feature_list:
• Equipment should be installed by a qualified professional
  • 10 Year Registered Warranty
  • 14 SEER
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant
  • AHRI Certified & ETL listed
  • Pressure and Temperature protection sensors help prevent damage
  • A shape coils, constructed with copper tubing and enhanced aluminum fins.
  • Gold Fin® condenser: corrosion resistant - live on the coast? Don't worry, our condenser is built to resist long term corrosion

329.short_description: ProDirect 2 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
329.long_description: Protect your home from this and many other summer’s arid heat with the power of the MRCOOL ProDirect 2 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser. The rotary compressor that works to compress and move the R-410A refrigerant throughout the system and through the piston flow control device is intensely efficient and cost-effective. The parts of this condenser will never let you break a sweat this summer. Your system is well-protected too, which means your comfort is well-protected. The galvanized steel cabinet guards the more delicate parts inside, and the Gold Fin® coating completely stops water from rusting the coils. This coating, which is environmentally friendly and non-toxic, can even make your system more efficient by providing another layer of insulation. With a long term warranty, this ETL listed and AHRI rated condenser will impress you with its cooling power every single day. Take your comfort seriously and choose something that will give you many summers of consistent cooling power, like the MRCOOL ProDirect 2 ton split system A/C condenser.

330.short_description: ProDirect 2.5 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
330.long_description: There isn’t much you can do with an air conditioning system that’s boosting your bills and the temperature of your home besides replace it, and for that, you should choose the ProDirect 2.5 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser. The rotary compressor within this system allows it to be faster and more efficient than other systems. The piston flow control device further improves efficiency, as well, making for a system that will drop both your bills and your home’s temperature lower than you can remember. This condenser will be one of the toughest units you’ve ever had in your home. You’ll love how sturdy the galvanized steel cabinet is, and how the Gold Fin® coating repels water and stops corrosion and rust in its tracks. There’s barely any risk of your system getting damaged thanks to the protection of the non-toxic, environmentally friendly Gold Fin® coating. This unit, which is ETL listed and AHRI rated, has serious warranty protection when registered. Never suffer through another sweaty summer again with the cooling power of this MRCOOL ProDirect 2.5 Ton split system A/C condenser.

331.short_description: ProDirect 3 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
331.long_description: Treat yourself to the comfort you’ve always dreamed of, especially if you’ve had to endure summer after summer of sweaty discomfort, with the ProDirect 3 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser. The rotary compressor within this system can process refrigerant extremely quickly to get your home feeling the precise temperature you prefer. The piston flow control device can bump your system’s efficiency levels up significantly, too. The safety of your system is a priority, because if something happens to it, you’ve lost your source of comfort! That’s why you can rely on the galvanized steel cabinet and the Gold Fin® coil coating to keep your unit running as if it’s brand new! This environmentally-friendly and non-toxic coating can keep water from sticking to the coils of your unit so rust can’t form. This AHRI certified and ETL listed unit is further protected by a reliable warranty once you register it online. Don’t be disappointed by an uncomfortable summer ever again with this MRCOOL ProDirect 3 Ton split system A/C condenser providing you comfort.

332.short_description: ProDirect 3.5 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
332.long_description: You’re not going to believe how much better your house feels after you scrap your old cooling unit and replace it with the ProDirect 3.5 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser. The scroll compressor in this unit is the key to making your home feel comfortable throughout the summer, because it compresses the R-410A refrigerant and releases the absorbed heat so it’s ready to remove more heat from your home. This efficient unit is even more cost-effective with the piston flow control device. You can keep comfortable despite any outdoor conditions you put your condenser through! This system is safeguarded by a galvanized steel cabinet and a Gold Fin® coil coating. The coil coating, which is non-toxic and environmentally friendly, can repel water from the system’s fins, ensuring that the unit will be without rust and corrosion. It also offers extra insulation. When this unit is installed, you can register it online to benefit from a superior warranty. When you need a new unit to bring you comfort, choose the ETL listed and AHRI certified MRCOOL ProDirect 3.5 ton split system A/C condenser.

333.short_description: ProDirect 4 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
333.long_description: You deserve rest and relaxation while you’re at home, which is why you need to throw out your old air conditioner that hasn’t kept you cool in ages and switch it out with the ProDirect 4 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser from MRCOOL. The scroll compressor works to process the refrigerant and move it through the system quickly and efficiently so that your home is brought to the exact temperature you want as soon as possible. For added efficiency, the piston flow control device manages the speed and volume of the refrigerant as it runs to bring you comfort. This unit has a galvanized steel cabinet protecting it from most damage, and a Gold Fin® coil coating that keeps rust and corrosion far away from your system by keeping water off the coils. This nice-looking, non-toxic, environmentally friendly coating also gives your system better insulation. Be sure to register this AHRI certified, ETL listed condenser online to receive strong warranty protection. You don’t have to go through another hot, sticky, sweaty summer when you’ve got comfort created by the MRCOOL ProDirect 4 ton split system A/C condenser.

334.short_description: ProDirect 5 Ton up to 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser
334.long_description: Keeping your home at a comfortable temperature is no trouble at all with the cooling power of this ProDirect 5 Ton 14 SEER Split System A/C Condenser, even in the blazing temperatures of summer. This system’s scroll compressor works hard to help the R-410A refrigerant release the heat it’s absorbed from your home. The speed and volume of the refrigerant is also managed by the piston flow control device, which aids in boosting efficiency. This system takes comfort seriously, which is why it uses a galvanized steel cabinet to protect itself from damage, as well as a Gold Fin® coating to stop water from sticking to the coils, which ensures that this system won’t rust or corrode. The extra layer of insulation that this environmentally-friendly, non-toxic coating offers the system lets you enjoy better efficiency overall. Make sure to register your ETL listed, AHRI rated unit online to get your well-deserved warranty coverage. The MRCOOL ProDirect 5 Ton split system A/C condenser is the right choice for cost-effective comfort for many years to come.

354.series: Universal Series High ESP Air Handler
354.unit_type: Universal Series High ESP Air Handler
354.short_description: Universal High ESP 24000 BTU Air Handler
354.long_description: The new Universal High-ESP Air Handler has been designed for use in high static pressure applications such as a manufactured or mobile home, or in a system that has restrictions in the ductwork which would place a strain on a conventional air handler not rated for high external static pressure. This air handler is equipped with a powerful and efficient DC fan motor that includes a fan with blades that are designed for quiet operation while still providing dynamic performance. The unit is capable of reaching a maximum static pressure of 250Pa. It offers multiple installation positions (vertical, horizontal left, or horizontal right) for an easy fit into many applications. The Universal High-ESP Air Handler also uses a durable metal filter that is both easy to clean and corrosion resistant to ensure it has a long service life.

358.long_description: The Universal Cooling-Only Condenser has been designed with versatility and efficiency in mind. 366.long_description: The Universal A-Coil is a versatile and adaptable option for your home comfort. It can be paired with other Universal units or as a replacement for an outdated, ineffective A-coil in your current system. The Universal A-Coil offers quieter operation and quick installation than many competitor models. It also features a liquid pipe designed to guard against excessive condensation. That could save you from costly property damage. It is equipped with multiple safeguards including protection against, high-pressure, high-discharge temperature, overload, IPM, and PFC in order to ensure effective and efficient operation for the life of the unit.

370.long_description: The new U-shaped Window Air Conditioner is the latest technology to come from MRCOOL. With its revolutionary U-Shaped design, this Air Conditioner gives you the ability to open and close the window it is installed in. By being able to close the window, it helps create a sound barrier to keep unwanted noise outside making it incredibly quiet. The unit also features a redesigned bracket that simplifies and shortens the installation process.

  • The ability to close the window the unit operates in, allows the sound of the compressor to remain outside and separate from the inside of your home.

394.long_description: The 4th Generation MRCOOL® DIY 18K BTU 2-Zone Ductless Heat Pump Condenser is the latest in heat pump technology. This 2-zone condenser, when paired with select MrCool air handlers, is capable of producing an impressive 21 SEER efficiency rating. It also has the ability to heat even when temperatures drop to -13°F. It features robust construction which includes a Gold Fin Condenser coating so it is sure to withstand exposure to the elements. For added peace of mind, this is the only condenser on the market that comes with a limited lifetime compressor warranty. As a MrCool DIY product, this heat pump is designed specifically to be used with MrCool’s patented Pre-Charged Quick Connect Line Sets. These line sets come pre-charged with the precise amount of R-410A refrigerant. They are also equipped with quick connectors, so the line set can be connected to the condenser by the homeowner using only wrenches. This means the installation process can be performed without retaining the services of a certified technician. Let the 4th Generation MrCool DIY 18K BTU 2-Zone Ductless Heat Pump Condenser be the solution to your home’s heating and cooling needs.
394.feature_list:
• Up to 21 SEER
  • Gold Fin® condenser: corrosion resistant - live on the coast? Don't worry, our condenser is built to resist long term corrosion
  • Energy Efficient DC Inverter
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant

  • Line sizes 1/4”, 1/2” & 3/8”, 5/8”
  • Multi-Zone Condenser includes adapter for the 24K Air Handler (3/8", 5/8" Line Size) - see liquid line and suction line size columns

395.long_description: Introducing the 4th Generation MRCOOL® DIY 27K BTU 3-Zone Ductless Heat Pump Condenser which is one of the most capable heat pumps on the market. When this 3-zone condenser is matched with select MrCool air handlers, it can produce a highly effective 22 SEER efficiency rating. It can also provide heating performance all the way down to -13°F. With its Gold Fin condenser coating, it is sure to withstand the seasons. To drive home the quality of this condenser, MrCool is the only manufacturer to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty. The cornerstone of this heat pump is its ability to be a Do-It-Yourself project for a homeowner. When used with MrCool’s patented Pre-Charged Quick Connect Line Set, the refrigerant piping can be connected with simple hand tools and does not require the services of a certified technician. It comes pre-charged with the correct amount of R-410A refrigerant so, once installed, it does not require vacuuming. Allow the capability, performance, and simplicity of a DIY installation of the 4th Generation MrCool DIY 27K BTU 3-Zone Ductless Heat Pump Condenser to be your only choice for your home’s heating and cooling.

MrCool stands behind the quality & durability of this condenser by being the only manufacturer to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty. However, the most innovative feature is that it can be installed by the homeowner without the use of a certified technician. This is possible because the condenser is intended to be used with MrCool’s patented Pre-Charged Quick Connect Line Sets. These line sets are precharged with R-410A refrigerant and feature quick connect connectors which allow it to be connected using only wrenches. Because it is pre-charged, the system will not require vacuuming once the installation is complete. The 4th Generation MrCool DIY 36K BTU 4-Zone Ductless Heat Pump is one of the best options on the market when it comes to multi-zone comfort.

Not only can it produce a 22 SEER efficiency rating it can also cover an area up to 375 sq. ft. It is also incredibly versatile and equipped with multiple operating modes, which include COOL, HEAT, AUTO, DRY (dehumidify), and SLEEP. This unit also has the capability to be controlled by your Apple or Android smartphone through the use of the Smart HVAC app. With its light and compact design, it can be installed easily to most interior walls with the included mounting plate. To take the simplicity of the installation even further, this air handler is designed to be used with MrCool’s patented Pre-Charged Quick Connect Line Set. The line set is equipped with quick connectors which give a DIY installer the ability to connect the refrigerant piping with wrenches. The line set comes from the factory pre-charged with the correct amount of R-410A refrigerant, so no vacuuming is necessary. Let the MrCool 4th Generation 9K BTU Ductless Wall Mounted Air Handler all of the heating and cooling necessities of your home.

414.short_description: The MRCOOL® DIY® Series OuttaSight™ 9k BTU Ceiling Cassette is perfect for any space and provide discreet and out of sight heating and cooling.
414.long_description: The MRCOOL® DIY® Series OuttaSight™ 9k BTU Ceiling Cassette is perfect for any space and provide discreet and out of sight heating and cooling. It is available in multi-zone options and is easy to install, fitting between 16” ceiling joists. The OuttaSight™ cassette is designed to work with both current and future joist standards and can be recessed between all types of joists on 16 inch center, including pre-manufactured I-joists. Other ceiling cassettes have strict installation requirements in less ideal locations, but the MrCool® OuttaSight™ doesn't require ductwork or wall space and is perfect for new constructions or retrofits. The cassette works with the MrCool® DIY® Quick Connect® line set which makes installation even easier since it is precharged with refrigerant, eliminating the need for vacuuming. The No-Vac® Coupler can be used to increase length. With advanced filtration, each cassette offers an Elevation function that lowers the filter panel for easy filter maintenance. Not only does this cassette feature quiet operation and multiple operating modes, but also provided is a limited lifetime warranty in addition to a 7-year compressor warranty and 5-year parts warranty, so you can feel confident in your investment.
414.feature_list:
• Fits between 16" Ceiling Joists
  • Featuring our easy access, elevating filter that can be lowered to a maximum of 4.9ft from the cassette.
  • Low Profile Installation
  • Pair with your DIY 4th gen Multi-Zone system
  • Designed to work with current and future joist standards, it can be recessed between all types of joists on 16 inch center - including pre-manufactured I-joists.

415.short_description: With an easy, low profile installation, the MRCOOL® DIY® Series OuttaSight™ 12k BTU Ceiling Cassette provides efficient heating and cooling that is perfect for any space, making it one of the most versatile ceiling units ever.
415.long_description: With an easy, low profile installation, the MRCOOL® DIY® Series OuttaSight™ 12k BTU Ceiling Cassette provides efficient heating and cooling that is perfect for any space, making it one of the most versatile ceiling units ever. The OuttaSight™ cassette is offered in multi-zone options. Unlike other ceiling cassettes, the MrCool® DIY® Series OuttaSight™ 12k BTU Ceiling Cassette doesn’t have strict installation requirements in less than ideal locations and can be recessed between all types of joists on 16 inch center, including pre-manufactured I-joists. Since it doesn’t require ductwork or wall space, it is perfect for both new construction or retrofits. The OuttaSight™ works with the MrCool® DIY® Quick Connect® line set which comes precharged with R-410A refrigerant. The No-Vac® Coupler can be used to increase the length of the line set if needed. In addition to the many operational modes and quiet operation, the cassette features swing technology and an Elevation function that lowers the filter panel for easy maintenance of the air filter. All of these features can be controlled with the included remote. For peace of mind, the cassette offers a limited lifetime warranty along with a 7-year compressor warranty and 5-year parts warranty.

This easy to install and easy to maintain unit is offered in both single-zone and multi-zone options and can provide coverage for large and small spaces. The OuttaSight™ cassette features an easy, low profile installation and can be recessed between all types of joists on 16 inch center including pre-manufactured I-joists. This makes it a perfect option for both new construction or retrofits. It doesn’t have strict installation requirements like other ceiling cassettes, so you’re able to install it in the location that suits you best, without using ductwork or wall space. The OuttaSight™ works with the MrCool® DIY® Quick Connect® line set and the No-Vac® Coupler to increase the length of the line set. 417.short_description: MRCOOL® Liquid Propane Tankless Water Heater
417.long_description: With the MRCOOL® Liquid Propane Tankless Water Heater, you can enjoy hot water much longer and consistently than usually experienced with traditional water heaters. This tankless water heater features a high volume and flow rate, high efficiency, and is capable of accommodating multiple home appliances and up to four bathrooms. This heater is space-saving and compact while being environmentally friendly as well. Advanced engineering was used to create the corrosion resistant stainless steel unit, which increases the lifespan of the heater. With four times the corrosion resistance of copper, this feature ensures you have clean water in and clean water out. The many high tech features that come with this heater include an electronic thermostatic PCB and an EDM BLDC variable-speed fan. Featuring an eco-friendly premixed burner, you can expect higher efficiency, a higher turn-down ratio, and safer anti-flashback burner. This also creates a reduction in NOx emissions. The smart self-adapting temperature regulation ensures a comfortable shower experience with accurate temperature regulation. The anti-freeze protection keeps the pipeline water higher than 40°F. The large touch screen display keeps you and your plumber informed about the heater’s operation during maintenance. This unit must be installed by a professional. Feel protected by the 15-year warranty on the heat exchanger, as well as a 5-year parts warranty and a 5-year labor warranty.

418.short_description: MRCOOL® Natural Gas Tankless Water Heater
418.long_description: Unlike traditional water heaters, the MRCOOL® Natural Gas Tankless Water Heater provides neverending hot water to up to four bathrooms and multiple home appliances simultaneously. With a high volume and flow rate, this tankless heater is highly efficient while still being environmentally friendly. This compact and space-saving heater has a much longer lifespan thanks to the stainless steel, corrosion resistant engineering. This design has four times the corrosion resistance of copper and is lead free. One of the many high tech features of this unit is the electronic thermostatic PCB, which provides intelligent temperature control and gas flow that is automatically controlled. The EDM BLDC variable-speed fan provides stable combustion along with a smooth air flow transition. The combustion chamber is surrounded by water tubes making it a thermal insulator also. The environmentally-friendly premixed burner gives a reduction of NOx emissions, lowers the flame temperature, and reduces port-loading. You can experience the most comfortable shower experience thanks to the self-adapting temperature regulation. A large touch-screen display provides helpful information to you and your plumber about the heater’s operation. This unit must be installed by a professional and offers a 15-year heat exchanger warranty, a 5-year parts warranty, and a 5-year labor warranty. This MrCool® Natural Gas Tankless Water Heater will replace your old water heater and provide efficiency and effectiveness.

432.long_description: Introducing the latest in home comfort technology, with the 4th Generation MRCOOL® DIY 12K BTU, 22 SEER Ductless Heat Pump System. This powerful single-zone system has the capability of heating and cooling an area up to 500 sq. ft. It comes complete with a 12K condenser, 12K air handler, and a 25 ft. line set pre-charged with R-410A refrigerant. The line set also has quick connectors which require no special tools, equipment, or training to install. The MrCool DIY system also includes many features that make it stand out among its competitors.The first of which is its ability to achieve an outstanding 22 SEER efficiency rating allowing it to be Energy Star certified. This system has many operating modes to select from to suit the needs of the user, including HEAT, COOL, DRY (dehumidification), and SLEEP. It also has the Follow Me function that adjusts the temperature of the room based on the temperature being read by the hand-held remote control. The DIY features the convenience of being able to operate its modes and functions with your smartphone by using the Smart HVAC app. The MrCool mini split is the only system on the market to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty.
432.feature_list:
• Gold Fin® condenser: corrosion-resistant coastal living - don't worry, our condenser is built to resist long term corrosion
  • Variable-speed DC inverter compressor technology cuts operating costs
  • R-410A environmentally friendly refrigerant
  • Standard 7-year compressor/5-year parts warranty; register for limited lifetime compressor warranty

433.long_description: The MRCOOL® 4th Generation DIY 18K BTU, 22 SEER Ductless Heat Pump system offers a complete solution to your home’s heating and cooling needs. This system can heat & cool an area up to 750 sq. ft and is capable of an Energy Star certified, 22 SEER efficiency rating. However, the best feature of this system is the ease of installation it provides to the homeowner. With the included pre-charged 25 ft. line set, some hand tools, and a few hours of time this entire system can be completely installed. This system comes equipped with many functions that separate it from the rest. It has multiple operating modes, which include AUTO, HEAT, COOL, FAN-ONLY, DRY (dehumidification) and SLEEP. It also features the Follow Me function, which allows the system to continually adjust the room temperature based on where the hand-held remote controller is. Need to operate the system when you’re not at home? No problem. The MrCool system also has the capability of being operated with your smartphone with the use of the Smart HVAC app. MrCool stands behind the quality and workmanship of this system by being the only manufacturer to offer a limited lifetime compressor warranty.

It also features durable construction and a corrosion-resistant Gold Fin condenser. All of this is contained within a Do-It-Yourself system that can be installed by a homeowner in a few hours using simple tools. This simplicity is achieved with the use of the patented MrCool Pre-Charged Quick-Connect Line Set included with the system. Not only is this system capable of delivering exceptional performance, it is also equipped with up to six operating modes, which include AUTO, HEAT, COOL, FAN-ONLY, DRY (dehumidification), and SLEEP. The system’s Follow Me Feature allows the system to adjust the room temperature based on wherever you’re standing with the hand-held remote control. 544.short_description: 24K BTU Hyper Heat Central Ducted Heat Pump Condenser
544.long_description: The MRCOOL® 24K BTU Hyper Heat Central Ducted Heat Pump Condenser is a dependable choice for handling extreme winter and summer temperatures. Boasting a DC Inverter and state-of-the-art variable speed technology, this unit offers exceptional efficiency, leading to significant savings on utility expenses without compromising performance. With an impressive SEER2 rating of up to 17.4 and an HSPF2-4 rating of up to 10, its enhanced heating capacity ensures indoor comfort even when outdoor temperatures range from -22°F to 122°F. Installation is simple for professional HVAC technicians using the MRCOOL® No-Vac® Quick Connect® Line Set. This exclusive line set eliminates the need for vacuuming or flare welding and is kink-resistant, accelerating the connection process and reducing installation costs. Moreover, the eco-friendly R-410A refrigerant ensures no environmental harm. Constructed from high-quality materials like painted galvanized steel, this durable unit can withstand damage from severe weather, animals, or yard equipment, guaranteeing reliable performance for years. In the unlikely event of any issues, the unit is supported by a 10-year warranty covering the compressor, parts, and labor. Additionally, the labor warranty is automatically activated upon installation, eliminating the need for a time-consuming registration process.

545.short_description: 36K BTU Hyper Heat Central Ducted Heat Pump Condenser
545.long_description: The 36K BTU MRCOOL® Hyper Heat Central Ducted Heat Pump Condenser offers a dependable solution for coping with the harshest winters and summers. Utilizing a DC Inverter and cutting-edge variable speed technology, the unit delivers remarkable efficiency, leading to significant utility cost savings without compromising performance. Boasting an impressive SEER2 rating of up to 16 and an HSPF2-4 rating of up to 9.5, its superior heating capacity ensures indoor comfort even when outdoor temperatures plummet to -22°F or soar to 122°F. Installation is effortless for professional HVAC technicians utilizing the compatible MRCOOL® No-Vac® Quick Connect® Line Set. This distinctive line set eliminates the need for vacuuming or flare welding and is kink-resistant, expediting the connection process and lowering installation costs. Furthermore, the unit employs the environmentally friendly R-410A refrigerant, ensuring no harm to the environment. Constructed with top-quality materials like painted galvanized steel, the unit is built to last and withstand damage from extreme weather, animals, or yard equipment. In the unlikely event of any issues, a 10-year warranty covering the compressor, parts, and labor supports the unit. 555.short_description: GeoCool 60K BTU 5T Multi Positional 230V 1-Phase 60Hz DC Inverter Compressor
555.long_description: Prepare to enjoy impressive performance and exceptional energy efficiency with the MRCOOL® Geocool® Geothermal Split System Compressor. With an all DC inverter system and a high precision electronic expansion valve, you can expect a much quieter, stable, and energy-saving experience with more accurate temperature control than with standard heating and cooling systems. The open loop water-to-air system’s superb energy efficiency boasts up to 70 EER, significantly lowering utility costs. Installation is easy with the compatible MRCOOL® Geocool® No-Vac® Line Set. The system features multiple flexible installation options including vertical, horizontal, and split configurations. This makes this system an excellent solution if your home has space constraints or requires modification to a different air outlet method. The compressor features multiple protections against potential damage along with a reliable and durable build and finish. The co-axial copper-nickel heat exchanger makes the system suitable for salt solution and lower water quality, and improves corrosion resistance and unit reliability. With a cooling noise level as low as 58dBA and heating noise level as low as 60dBa, you’re able to enjoy superior comfort without any distraction. For peace of mind, this MRCOOL® Geocool® Geothermal Split System Compressor offers a 10-year parts warranty as well as a 5-year limited labor warranty.

605.short_description: MRCOOL® 60k BTU 17 SEER2 Universal  DC Inverter Packaged Heat Pump-R410A
605.long_description: Experience top-tier heating and cooling efficiency while simultaneously reducing utility bills and lessening your environmental footprint with the MRCOOL® DC Inverter Package Heat Pump. This energy-efficient ducted system delivers comfort through a single, conveniently packaged outdoor unit, all without the need for fossil fuels.  The root of its exceptional efficiency lies in the variable speed DC compressor, which minimizes power loss, ensuring the unit operates at a notably lower noise level. This translates into uninterrupted regulation of room temperature to cater to individual preferences. The compressor and DC motor's adjustable speeds provide a wide range of cooling and heating, spanning from -22°F to 125°F.  The unit also offers versatile air return options from either the side or the bottom, accommodating both traditional and rooftop installations. For added flexibility, optional heat kits are available to suit specific requirements.  What sets the MRCOOL® DC Inverter Package Heat Pump apart is its rapid response to indoor and outdoor temperature changes, efficiently adapting to load demands. Additionally, its intelligent defrosting technology enhances winter heating performance by assessing frost conditions.  Rest assured in your investment with 10-year warranties covering labor, parts, and the compressor—all without the need for cumbersome registration processes. Elevate your comfort, energy efficiency, and peace of mind today with MRCOOL®
